下任廠長暫停受注 阿迪達成大熱

【now.com體育】英國博彩公司已停止阿仙奴下任領隊的受注，前隊長阿迪達成為接替雲加的大熱人選。

英國《太陽報》透露，國內博彩公司突然暫停下任阿仙奴領隊人選的受注，據悉原因是出現大量投向候選人之一阿迪達（Mikel Arteta）的注碼，疑似有人獲得阿仙奴新任領隊真命天子的可靠消息。

除投注情況不尋常外，祖雲達斯教練艾歷利宣佈留隊，亦令阿迪達出任新廠長的行情看漲。此外，曾被雲加委任為阿仙奴隊長的阿迪達，亦是行政總裁加迪斯的喜愛球員，由這名現任曼城助教返回兵工廠擔任新領隊，預料亦不會出現太多交接上的問題。

報道指，阿仙奴最快會於周五公佈新教頭人選，而被指有機會出掌兵工廠主帥的名字，還有德甲賀芬咸教練拿格斯文、法甲摩納哥教練查甸，但賀芬咸已表明拿格斯文會留隊。

達子

英軍今點兵 BBC：韋舒亞勢落選

【now.com體育】繼有指赫特不會入選英格蘭的世界盃大軍，連韋舒亞也無緣出戰。

英格蘭代表隊領隊修夫基將於今日公佈出戰今夏世界盃決賽周的23人大軍名單，但BBC周二率先爆料，指門將赫特、中場韋舒亞（Jack Wilshere）將齊齊不會入選。26歲的韋舒亞今季在阿仙奴翻生，更重要是擺脫傷患，上陣38場，到下半季更成為球隊常規正選，在中場表現出色，3月友賽時已重新入選，只是因傷而避戰。

至於赫特本來的正選門將席位，將由比克福特擔任。根據英國《太陽報》同日報道，除了以上兩人之外，左閘賴恩貝蘭特同樣無緣世界盃，修夫基將會挑選今季於曼聯有出色表現的艾舒利楊格、在曼城轉踢左閘而上位的戴爾夫。
放飯

ARSENAL TARGET WANTS PL MOVE

Freiburg defender Caglar Soyuncu, a summer target for Arsenal, wants a move to the Premier League, according to football.london.

The 21-year-old's agent is quoted as saying: "The main objective of the player is to play in the Premier League, that I can tell you at the moment."

Arsenal and Spurs to battle for Lemina

Arsenal and Tottenham are just two of the teams interested in signing Southampton midfielder Mario Lemina this summer, according to Footmercato.

The 24-year-old has made 29 appearances across all competitions since joining the Saints from Juventus last summer.

Everton and West Ham are also tracking Lemina, who plays internationally for Gabon.

【now.com體育】英國博彩公司已停止阿仙奴下任領隊的受注，前隊長阿迪達成為接替雲加的大熱人選。
英國《太陽報》透露，國內博彩公司突然暫停下任阿仙奴領隊人選的受注，據悉原因是出現大量投向候選人之一阿迪達（Mikel Arteta）的注碼，疑似有人獲得阿仙奴新任領隊真命天子的可靠消息。
除投注情況不尋常外，祖雲達斯教練艾歷利宣佈留隊，亦令阿迪達出任新廠長的行情看漲。此外，曾被雲加委任為阿仙奴隊長的阿迪達，亦是行政總裁加迪斯的喜愛球員，由這名現任曼城助教返回兵工廠擔任新領隊，預料亦不會出現太多交接上的問題。
報道指，阿仙奴最快會於周五公佈新教頭人選，而被指有機會出掌兵工廠主帥的名字，還有德甲賀芬咸教練拿格斯文、法甲摩納哥教練查甸，但賀芬咸已表明拿格斯文會留隊。

英格蘭代表隊領隊修夫基將於今日公佈出戰今夏世界盃決賽周的23人大軍名單，但BBC周二率先爆料，指門將赫特、中場韋舒亞（Jack Wilshere）將齊齊不會入選。26歲的韋舒亞今季在阿仙奴翻生，更重要是擺脫傷患，上陣38場，到下半季更成為球隊常規正選，在中場表現出色，3月友賽時已重新入選，只是因傷而避戰。

原來迪達有 in charge 過一場波
Arsenal vs Manchester City

When Theo Walcott scored for Arsenal just four minutes into their game against Manchester City in December 2016, the television cameras panned to Pep Guardiola. Fresh from damaging defeats against Chelsea and Leicester City, City's title challenge was unravelling.

Another loss against the Gunners would have been City's third in four league games and Guardiola - and his suitability to English football - was under the microscope. Yet he was not City manager that day. Mikel Arteta was.

"The team is yours," Guardiola told Arteta in the days leading up to the clash.

Guardiola had added Arteta to his trusted coaching staff that summer and the former midfielder had made such an impression in those first few months that he was trusted with taking charge for the game against Arsenal, his old club.

Hamstrung by injuries and suspensions, and with a decision to scrap a three-man defence already made, Arteta did not have too much room to make sweeping changes, although Kevin De Bruyne started the game on the left of a front three, with Leroy Sane on the right and Raheem Sterling through the middle - the first time he had been used in such a role that season.

Trailing at half-time, De Bruyne was put through the middle, Sterling moved to the right and Sane to the left. Within two minutes Sane darted through the middle to equalise, before Sterling cut in from the right to win it.

財富研究機構調查Wealth-X近日發布新一份《億萬富豪人口普查報告》顯示，截至2017年底止，全球億萬富翁總財富增加24%至9.2萬億美元，創歷史新高，人數方面增加近15%至2,754名，亦是史上最多，較2015年的舊紀錄2,473人，增加281人。

億萬富翁數量排名前10的國家和地區，分別為美國擁680名(總財富3.2萬億美元)、中國內地338名(總財富1.1萬億美元)、德國152名(總財富4,660億美元)、印度104名(總財富2,990億美元)、瑞士99名(總財富2,650億美元)、俄羅斯96名(總財富3,510億美元)、香港93名(總財富3,150億美元)、英國90名(總財富2,510億美元)、沙特阿拉伯62名(總財富1,690億美元)及阿聯酋62名(總財富1,680億美元)。

若以全球主要城市劃分，全球億萬富翁人數最多的是紐約(103名)，其次是香港(93名)及三藩市(74名)。

報告指出，財富增長受益於全球經濟復甦及股市向好，而這些億萬富翁對經濟的影響正不斷上升。據普查數據，現時全球有更多億萬富翁，主要涉及科技範疇，亞洲富翁的數量亦正處增長勢頭。

英格蘭代表隊領隊修夫基將於今日公佈出戰今夏世界盃決賽周的23人大軍名單，但BBC周二率先爆料，指門將赫特、中場韋舒亞（Jack Wilshere）將齊齊不會入選。26歲的韋舒亞今季在阿仙奴翻生，更重要是擺脫傷患，上陣38場，到下半季更成為球隊常規正選，在中場表現出色，3月友賽時已重新入選，只是因傷而避戰。

Arsene Wenger Was Relaxed During His Last Days – Arsenal Star

Arsenal striker Alexandre Lacazette has revealed that Arsene Wenger was in a relaxed mood during the last days of his reign as Gunners manager.

Asked how he will remember Wenger, Lacazette told French sports daily L’Equipe: “The image and the respect he left for the club.

“In his last game at the Emirates, everyone sang for him. One feels that the club was part of his skin after 22 years.

“On the day of his las game he didn’t cry and that required strength but we felt his emotion.

“In the chat, he even managed to crack a few jokes, which was surely his way of hiding things.”

He added: “And during his last day he looked more relaxed, every day.”

奧巴美揚唔怕失「雲」：下季會更好

【now.com體育】雖然阿仙奴在領隊雲加離開後前境不明，但射手奧巴美揚對球隊下季前景仍然信心十足。

領隊雲加在執教了阿仙奴22年後，終於在季後離隊，正當不少人都擔心球隊前景時，奧巴美揚（Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang）就十分老定：「在過去數星期，我們踢得很好，而且陣中有很多出色小將，對新領隊絕對是好事。我十分看好將來，下季肯定是一個好球季。」

這名加蓬國腳在1月從多蒙特來投後，12場英超轟入10球，包括煞科日對哈特斯菲爾德的全場唯一入球，是最快在阿仙奴取得10球的球員。

他很高興可以用勝仗歡送雲爺爺：「這場勝利對我們很重要，因為這是領隊的最後一場，我們想為他拿下勝利。我們給了他最大的掌聲，而且傾談了很多，更寫了一本書給他。」

Arsenal looking to bolster defence with THREE signings this summer - and Borussia Dortmund star tops list

Arsenal want Borussia Dortmund defender Sokratis Papastathopoulos - and want to sign TWO centre halves this summer.

Greek defender Papastathopoulos, 29, is available for around £15m and Arsenal’s head of recruitment Sven Mislintat knows him well.


But Arsenal want to bolster the defence further with West Brom’s Jonny Evans available for £3m while they have also held talks with Freiburg over their Turkish defender Caglar Soyuncu.

It comes because Arsenal are ready to offload defensive flop Shkodran Mustafi and Laurent Koscielny is out until at least Christmas with a long term Achilles injury.

Arsenal also want a holding midfielder and, as revealed in March, a new keeper with Bayer Leverkusen keeper Bernd Leno their No1 choice.

https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/transfer-news/arsenal-looking-bolster-defence-three-12545477

By John Cross

PEREZ OPEN TO LAZIO

Arsenal exile Lucas Perez, who has been on loan in Spain with Deportivo La Coruna for the past year, is interested in a move to Lazio, according to his agent.

Speaking to a Lazio fan site of all sources, his agent Rodrigo Fernandez said: "Lazio asked for him last year, but nothing came of it.

“Lucas has always liked Lazio and the city of Rome, plus his great friend, Luis Alberto, plays for them.

“He still has two years left on his contract with Arsenal, so we need to talk to them first.

“As for Lucas, he likes the idea of playing for Lazio, but it’s still too early to talk about it.”

Arsenal are lining up a move for Borussia Dortmund's Sokratis Papastathopoulos after failing to agree on a fee for Caglar Soyuncu

Arsenal have asked about Borussia Dortmund defender Sokratis Papastathopoulos amid concerns over their pursuit of Freiburg's Caglar Soyuncu.

Mikel Arteta is likely to have a limited budget to work with if, as expected, he is appointed manager following Arsenal's expenditure in January and Freiburg's £35million asking price for Soyuncu is a concern.

Sokratis is well known to Sven Mislintat, Arsenal's head of recruitment, from their days together at Dortmund and would cost considerably less at around £17.5m.
